sql:
SELECT
  id,
  argMax(name, time) AS name,
  groupArrayInsertAt(
    0,
    toUInt32(dateDiff('month', toDate('2015-1-1'), toDate('2016-12-1'))) + 1)(ROUND(attention, 2),
    toUInt32(dateDiff('month', toDate('2015-1-1'), time))) AS attention
FROM
(
  SELECT
    toStartOfMonth(created_at) AS time,
    org_id AS id, argMax(org_login, time) AS name,
    countIf(type='WatchEvent') AS stars,
    countIf(type='ForkEvent') AS forks,
    stars + 2 * forks AS attention
  FROM gh_events
  WHERE type IN ('WatchEvent', 'ForkEvent') AND (org_id IN [1342004]) AND  created_at >= toDate('2015-1-1') AND created_at < dateAdd(month, 1, toDate('2016-12-1'))
  GROUP BY id, time
  
)
GROUP BY id
ORDER BY attention[-1] DESC
    LIMIT 3
